title: dinamum muruganai
sahitya:
dinamum muruganai ninai manamE nI tIvinai ozhiyavE Avi kuzhaiyavE


anupallavi

  ninaivu unadai oru nilaiyil nirutti nI nimmadiyAgap-pazhani mEvum avanai


caraNam    calanamuTru vIN sankaTam uTrAl phalanaTrun vAzhvu pAzh paTTu pOgum
ulagam adanil nI uidu pizhaikkavum sulabhamAga sukham eidu kaLikkavum
